pr_title: Temporarily switch to using apk in browserstack

timeline.message: Temporarily switch to using apk in browserstack

timeline.bodyText: can we define this switch as a Jenkins flag so that we don't need to make a code change in future for shifting across apk and bundle
timeline.author: shubham1g5
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -40,15 +40,15 @@ def buildTestCommand(appToken, testToken):
     if "BASE_LOCATION" in os.environ:
         baseLoc = os.environ["BASE_LOCATION"]
 
-    releaseAppBundle = baseLoc + "bundle/commcareRelease/app-commcare-release.aab"
+    releaseApk = baseLoc + "apk/commcare/release/app-commcare-release.apk"

replies.bodyText: Yeah, we can have two variables there instead of BASE_LOCATION that gives the exact location of release apk and test apk.
replies.author: ShivamPokhriyal

timeline.message: Use jenkins env var for app locations
